name: 楚雨虹
description:
"Chu YuHong" is a film by newcomer director Ximing Ye, based on a shopping mall that was formerly an orphanage, creating a documentary about the prodigy with the "yin yang eyes".

The film is still in the review process and is now circulating in its pilot version, which is said to hide many secrets of the orphanage and to clear the injustice of the "yin yang eye" prodigy.

In the process of watching this film, you can choose to drag the separator bar between frames to connect two frames, or you can interact with the scene by clicking and keyboard E key, or move by A/D key.

The pilot version of "Chu YuHong" only contains the first and second chapters of the original film, the third chapter will be released soon, so please look forward to it.

Who exactly is Chu Yuhong? please tell me your answer.

(This prototype is only in Chinese, and we are working on the localization now.)

Core Designer - Jack

Narrative Designer - Jack

Mechanics Designer - Jack, Alex Xiong

2D Artist - Alice, Joy, Nicole

2D Animator - Nicole

CG Artist - Alice

UI Designer - Alex Xiong

Core Programmer - Luty

Programmer - Tommy, Jack

Music & Sound - WeiMinor
